original: @27b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @27b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa nutta ra sarba shuddhe kra mam n'a ma /
analyzed: aa nutta ra sarba shuddhe kra mam n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Stages of Union of the Unsurpassed

original: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Heruka.

original: ji ltar padma 'dam las skyes //üîΩde bzhin ma rig mun pa las //
analyzed: ji ltar padma 'dam las skyes // de bzhin ma rig mun pa las //
translated: Just as a lotus grows from the mud,üîΩso too nondual awareness

original: gnyis med rig pa skye 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: gnyis med rig pa skye 'gyur ba'i //
translated: arises from the darkness of ignorance.

original: rang rig de la phyag 'tshal nas //üîΩbla med sbyor ba'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: rang rig de la phyag 'tshal nas // bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa yis //
translated: Homage to that self-awareness,üîΩand I will explain the stainless Dharma

original: dri med dam chos bshad par bya //
analyzed: dri med dam chos bshad par bya //
translated: through the stages of the unsurpassed union.

original: stong dang shin tu stong pa ste //
analyzed: stong dang shin tu stong pa ste //
translated: The empty and the very empty

original: stong pa chen po gsum pa yin //
analyzed: stong pa chen po gsum pa yin //
translated: are the third, the great empty.

original: bzhi pa rgyu 'bras thams cad do //
analyzed: bzhi pa rgyu 'bras thams cad do //
translated: The fourth is all causes and effects.

original: thabs shes yang dag sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: thabs shes yang dag sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the union of method and wisdom,

original: rdzogs rim yang dag nye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdzogs rim yang dag nye bar 'gyur //
translated: the perfection stage will be perfected.

original: rdzogs pa nye bar mthong ba yis //
analyzed: rdzogs pa nye bar mthong ba yis //
translated: By seeing the perfection,

original: thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal yin //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal yin //
translated: it is the clear light of the emptiness of all.

original: rang rig gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: rang rig gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: Through the yoga of the three self-awarenesses,

original: rgyu gsum rnam par dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu gsum rnam par dag par 'gyur //
translated: the three causes will be purified.

original: stong nyid don ni rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: stong nyid don ni rtogs pa yin //
translated: The meaning of emptiness will be realized.

original: bla na med pa'i gnas thob 'gyur //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i gnas thob 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the unsurpassed state.üîΩClear light, emptiness, and wisdom

original: 'od gsal stong pa shes rab dang // sems nyid gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang //
analyzed: 'od gsal stong pa shes rab dang // sems nyid gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang //
translated: Follow the mind itself.

original: de la bdag gis 'di ltar ni //
analyzed: de la bdag gis 'di ltar ni //
translated: In this regard, I will explain

original: yang dag 'phros pas bshad par bya //
analyzed: yang dag 'phros pas bshad par bya //

original: rnam par chags shing shin tu chags //
analyzed: rnam par chags shing shin tu chags //

original: chags pa chen po de bzhin no //
analyzed: chags pa chen po de bzhin no //
translated: And likewise, great attachment.

original: gti mug la sogs dug gsum gyis //
analyzed: gti mug la sogs dug gsum gyis //
translated: The three poisons of delusion and so on

original: brtan dang g-yo ba'i sems nyid 'di //
analyzed: brtan dang g-yo ba'i sems nyid 'di //

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum//
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum//
translated: The past, future, and present

original: @28a * // zhi dang chags dang rtogs par ldan //
analyzed: @28a * // zhi dang chags dang rtogs par ldan //
translated: Are endowed with peace, desire, and realization.

original: phyi rol ji ltar nang na gnas //
analyzed: phyi rol ji ltar nang na gnas //
translated: How does the external abide within?

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ba //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ba //
translated: The past, future, and present

original: 'das pa'i 'das par bdag gnas so //
analyzed: 'das pa'i 'das par bdag gnas so //
translated: Are the past of the past.

original: srid pa che dang shin tu srid //
analyzed: srid pa che dang shin tu srid //
translated: Great existence and complete existence

original: bkres dang skom pa kun du ldan //
analyzed: bkres dang skom pa kun du ldan //
translated: Are endowed with hunger and thirst.üîΩFeeling, lying down, and feelingüîΩAre the single moment of intense feeling.

original: tshor ba nyal ba'i tshor ba dang // shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig gcig / so sor rtog dang snying rjer ldan //
analyzed: tshor ba nyal ba'i tshor ba dang // shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig gcig / so sor rtog dang snying rjer ldan //

original: ngo mtshar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la //
analyzed: ngo mtshar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la //

original: nyams dang phrag dog rnam par bsags //
analyzed: nyams dang phrag dog rnam par bsags //
translated: And the experience of jealousy is accumulated.

original: de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyis //
analyzed: de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyis //
translated: In this way, the thirty-three

original: rang rig ye shes rnam par 'gribs //
analyzed: rang rig ye shes rnam par 'gribs //
translated: Diminish the pristine consciousness of self-awareness.

original: rnal 'byor ba yi nyams len la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yi nyams len la //
translated: In the practice of the yogin,

original: nam mkha' bde chen padma'i dbus //
analyzed: nam mkha' bde chen padma'i dbus //
translated: In the center of the lotus of great bliss of space,

original: zla ba'i gdan la ham yig gnas //
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan la ham yig gnas //
translated: The syllable ha·πÉ abides on a moon seat.

original: kun rdzob gsal zhing dri ma med //
analyzed: kun rdzob gsal zhing dri ma med //
translated: The relative is clear and stainless.

original: 'byung 'jug rlung 'dzin ye shes yin //
analyzed: 'byung 'jug rlung 'dzin ye shes yin //
translated: The pristine consciousness that holds the exhaled and inhaled breath

original: zla tshes dmar po shes rab ste //
analyzed: zla tshes dmar po shes rab ste //
translated: Is the red crescent moon of wisdom,

original: dbyangs yig dang po thig ler ldan //
analyzed: dbyangs yig dang po thig ler ldan //
translated: Endowed with the first vowel and a drop.

original: rlung ni 'dzin phyir bsgom par bya //üîΩde ni 'od gsal skar chen ltar //
analyzed: rlung ni 'dzin phyir bsgom par bya // de ni 'od gsal skar chen ltar //
translated: One should meditate in order to hold the vƒÅyu.üîΩThat is the method of the empty mind,

original: sems nyid stong pa'i thabs yin no //üîΩgzugs dang bral zhing kha dog med //üîΩzhi ba'i rnam pa zung 'jug bral //
analyzed: sems nyid stong pa'i thabs yin no // gzugs dang bral zhing kha dog med // zhi ba'i rnam pa zung 'jug bral //
translated: Like the great star of luminosity.üîΩFree from form and color,üîΩFree from the aspect of peace and union,

original: brtan dang g-yo ba'i tha snyad med //
analyzed: brtan dang g-yo ba'i tha snyad med //
translated: Free from the conventions of animate and inanimate,

original: de ltar bla ma'i drin gyis ni //
analyzed: de ltar bla ma'i drin gyis ni //
translated: In that way, through the kindness of the guru,

original: 'das dar ma 'ongs da lta ba //
analyzed: 'das dar ma 'ongs da lta ba //
translated: The past, future, and present

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: Are seen by the samƒÅdhi of vajra recitation.

original: ci yang mthong 'gyur the tshom med //
analyzed: ci yang mthong 'gyur the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt.

original: ji ltar bud shing skam po la //
analyzed: ji ltar bud shing skam po la //
translated: Just as, even though the cause of fire

original: me rgyu gnas kyang 'bar ba med //üîΩde bzhin brda dang rtsol med la //
analyzed: me rgyu gnas kyang 'bar ba med // de bzhin brda dang rtsol med la //
translated: is present in dry firewood, it does not blaze,üîΩso, even though there is a loving mind

original: byams sems gnas kyang grub pa med //
analyzed: byams sems gnas kyang grub pa med //
translated: in one who is without words and effort, there is no accomplishment.

original: de phyir nga rgyal la sogs spang //
analyzed: de phyir nga rgyal la sogs spang //

original: brtson 'grus bskyed la bla ma bkur //
analyzed: brtson 'grus bskyed la bla ma bkur //
translated: having generated diligence, and having honored the guru,

original: dbang bskur thob nas nyams len gyis //
analyzed: dbang bskur thob nas nyams len gyis //
translated: having obtained empowerment, one should practice.

original: rnal 'byor dang po'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang po'i sbyor ba yis //

original: sa ni brgyad po thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa ni brgyad po thob par 'gyur //
translated: one obtains the eight stages.

original: 'od gsal gsum ldan rdzogs pa yis //
analyzed: 'od gsal gsum ldan rdzogs pa yis //
translated: By perfecting the three-fold clear light,

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa thob po //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa thob po //
translated: one obtains the stage of complete perfection.üîΩEven though one has obtained empowerment, if one denigrates it,üîΩif one has little diligence and holds wrong views,

original: dbang bskur thob kyang skur pa 'debs pa dang // brtson 'grus chung la log lta 'dzin pa dang // bla ma'i skyon brjod yon tan brjod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang bskur thob kyang skur pa 'debs pa dang // brtson 'grus chung la log lta 'dzin pa dang // bla ma'i skyon brjod yon tan brjod mi 'gyur //
translated: if one does not proclaim the guru‚Äôs faults and virtues,

analyzed: rgyal ba'i lam ni de yis thob mi 'gyur //
translated: one will not obtain the path of the Victor.

original: bkur sti med cing de nyid thob tu re //
analyzed: bkur sti med cing de nyid thob tu re //
translated: Even though one has no respect, if one hopes to obtain reality,

original: tshig ni 'jam ste khro tshul bstan nas 'gro //
analyzed: tshig ni 'jam ste khro tshul bstan nas 'gro //
translated: one should go with gentle words, displaying an angry demeanor.

original: mi tshogs mang po gnas pa'i sa ru ni //
analyzed: mi tshogs mang po gnas pa'i sa ru ni //
translated: In a place where there is a crowd of people,

original: bla ma mthong yang phyag sogs mi byed de //
analyzed: bla ma mthong yang phyag sogs mi byed de //

original: snod dang mi ldan gdams ngag mi spyin no //
analyzed: snod dang mi ldan gdams ngag mi spyin no //
translated: They are not vessels, so they are not given instructions.

original: yon tan bzang thob brtson 'grus ldan pa ni //
analyzed: yon tan bzang thob brtson 'grus ldan pa ni //

original: @28b bla ma 'khor sogs bkur sti ldan pa la //
analyzed: @28b bla ma 'khor sogs bkur sti ldan pa la //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam pa'i dga' ba 'dzin //

analyzed: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos la sred pa che //

original: rgyud rten rgyud mang rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: rgyud rten rgyud mang rdo rje sems dpa' ni //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'gyur ba de //
translated: that which becomes the path of the bodhisattva,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob rgyur 'gyur ba //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob rgyur 'gyur ba //

original: 'gro ba drug la bsngo zhing bkra shis shog / bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon b'a da ga dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro ba drug la bsngo zhing bkra shis shog / bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon b'a da ga dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
